dmca.title: Close Encounters with "CLOSE" trademark
dmca.body:
Dave,

This is the final offer for close.com for the sum of $6,000.00, along with hosting for your BBS.  Just to inform you we do hold the claim to the word, Close for Telephone Communication Services in class 38 (US CLS 100, 101 and 104).

The registration number for trademark and patent is 2,519,794 and was registered on December 18, 2001.


The final offer I'm extending to you is in effect until Wednesday July 3, 2002 at 12 pm Eastern Standard Time.  At this time if our offer is not accepted we will have our lawyers pursue this matter farther along with no further monetary compensation.

If you would like for me to fax you a copy of the trademark and patent I will be more than glad to.  Or if you would like to speak to me over the telephone regarding this matter please call me at the extension below.

Thank You,

[Private]
Manager
Internet / IT Department
[telephone]
